desc.en: Aru grapples with her feelings after realizing that the ones who treated her to a bowl of ramen were actually Abydos students. She resolves anew to attack Abydos High School with her hired guns.

desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠後來才知道招待自己吃拉麵的對象是阿拜多斯高中的學生。亞瑠被罪惡感煎熬好一陣子，但還是馬上狠下心，動員人手前去攻擊阿拜多斯高中。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force learn that Problem Solver 68 is a group of delinquents from Gehenna Academy and that the Helmet Gang's weapons came from the Black Market. Sensei and the students head there to investigate.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force learn that Problem Solver 68 is a group of delinquents from Gehenna Academy and that the Helmet Gang's weapons came from the Black Market. Sensei and the students head there to investigate.
desc.thai: The Foreclosure Task Force learn that Problem Solver 68 is a group of delinquents from Gehenna Academy and that the Helmet Gang's weapons came from the Black Market. Sensei and the students head there to investigate.
desc.ko: The Foreclosure Task Force learn that Problem Solver 68 is a group of delinquents from Gehenna Academy and that the Helmet Gang's weapons came from the Black Market. Sensei and the students head there to investigate.
desc.zh_tw: 綜合從之前的戰鬥中收集到的情報,對策委員會學生查出，<便利屋68>的職員是格黑娜出身的不良學生，以及頭盔團所使用的武器是從<黑市>流入的事實。老師和對策委員會學生為了尋找其他線索而前往黑市。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 综合从之前的战斗中收集到的情报,对策委员会学生查出，<便利屋68>的职员是格黑娜出身的不良学生，以及头盔团所使用的武器是从<黑市>流入的事实。老师和对策委员会学生为了寻找其他线索而前往黑市。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 综合从之前的战斗中收集到的情报,对策委员会学生查出，<便利屋68>的职员是格黑娜出身的不良学生，以及头盔团所使用的武器是从<黑市>流入的事实。老师和对策委员会学生为了寻找其他线索而前往黑市。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 综合从之前的战斗中收集到的情报,对策委员会学生查出，<便利屋68>的职员是格黑娜出身的不良学生，以及头盔团所使用的武器是从<黑市>流入的事实。老师和对策委员会学生为了寻找其他线索而前往黑市。

desc.en: On the way to school, Sensei met Ayane. Ayane said she was going to prepare for the debt payment at school and had found everything about the Problem Solver 68. It was then that Mutsuki appeared. Mutsuki invited Sensei to pay a visit on them, but was scolded by Ayane before leaving.
desc.jp: On the way to school, Sensei met Ayane. Ayane said she was going to prepare for the debt payment at school and had found everything about the Problem Solver 68. It was then that Mutsuki appeared. Mutsuki invited Sensei to pay a visit on them, but was scolded by Ayane before leaving.
desc.thai: On the way to school, Sensei met Ayane. Ayane said she was going to prepare for the debt payment at school and had found everything about the Problem Solver 68. It was then that Mutsuki appeared. Mutsuki invited Sensei to pay a visit on them, but was scolded by Ayane before leaving.
desc.ko: On the way to school, Sensei met Ayane. Ayane said she was going to prepare for the debt payment at school and had found everything about the Problem Solver 68. It was then that Mutsuki appeared. Mutsuki invited Sensei to pay a visit on them, but was scolded by Ayane before leaving.
desc.zh_tw: 老師在路上遇到了綾音，綾音表示要回學校準備還款，並且已經查清了便利店68的資料。這時無月突然出現，邀請老師帶便利屋68看看，被綾音呵斥候離開。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师在路上遇到了绫音，绫音表示要回学校准备还款，并且已经查清了便利店68的资料。这时睦月突然出现，邀请老师带便利屋68看看，被绫音呵斥候离开。

desc.en: Ayane found out all the information of Problem Solver 68, stressing that they were seen as problem children in Gehenna, and therefore they should be handled with caution. On the other hand, Ayane thought that if they need to find the origin of the illegal weapons, they might have to visit the Black Market.

desc.en: After outrunning the Black Market Guard, the group begins to question their resolve. Hoshino persuades them to take only the documents they need. Later, Problem Solver discovers the piles of money that were left behind.
desc.jp: After outrunning the Black Market Guard, the group begins to question their resolve. Hoshino persuades them to take only the documents they need. Later, Problem Solver discovers the piles of money that were left behind.

desc.ko: After outrunning the Black Market Guard, the group begins to question their resolve. Hoshino persuades them to take only the documents they need. Later, Problem Solver discovers the piles of money that were left behind.
desc.zh_tw: 躲過黑市保鑣追擊,順利逃脫的對策委員會一行人。他們看到額數驚人的現金，頓時陷入苦惱。但是很快就被星野說服，決定只帶著部分需要文件逃跑。而他們留下的一捆捆現金，則被亞瑠和便利屋職員撿走。

desc.en: When confirming the situation, everyone was surprised to find out that the 100 million money was with them all the time. Serika and Nonomi wanted to use them to pay the debt, but was opposed by Hoshino greatly. Hoshino said that the bottom lines could not be crossed. At last everyone agreed to take away the documents only.

desc.en: The documents reveal the true mastermind: a mega-syndicate known as the Kaiser Corporation. Confronted with such a seemingly insurmountable societal evil, the dejected students of the Foreclosure Task Force call it a day.
desc.jp: The documents reveal the true mastermind: a mega-syndicate known as the Kaiser Corporation. Confronted with such a seemingly insurmountable societal evil, the dejected students of the Foreclosure Task Force call it a day.
desc.thai: The documents reveal the true mastermind: a mega-syndicate known as the Kaiser Corporation. Confronted with such a seemingly insurmountable societal evil, the dejected students of the Foreclosure Task Force call it a day.
desc.ko: The documents reveal the true mastermind: a mega-syndicate known as the Kaiser Corporation. Confronted with such a seemingly insurmountable societal evil, the dejected students of the Foreclosure Task Force call it a day.
desc.zh_tw: 透過從暗黑銀行帶來的文件，對策委員會一行人得知所有事件的黑幕，就是大型企業<凱薩公司>。在包圍學校的社會巨惡面前，學生們失去鬥志後決定暫時解散。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 通过从暗黑银行带来的文档，对策委员会一行人得知所有事件的黑幕，就是大型企业<凯萨公司>。在包围学校的社会巨恶面前，学生们失去斗志后决定暂时解散。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 通过从暗黑银行带来的文档，对策委员会一行人得知所有事件的黑幕，就是大型企业<凯萨公司>。在包围学校的社会巨恶面前，学生们失去斗志后决定暂时解散。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 通过从暗黑银行带来的文档，对策委员会一行人得知所有事件的黑幕，就是大型企业<凯萨公司>。在包围学校的社会巨恶面前，学生们失去斗志后决定暂时解散。

desc.en: After a careful inspection on the records, they did find out the money was flowing into the bank, and was directly used to support the Helmet Gang. Everything showed that Kaiser Corporation seemed to be plotting against Abydos.
desc.jp: After a careful inspection on the records, they did find out the money was flowing into the bank, and was directly used to support the Helmet Gang. Everything showed that Kaiser Corporation seemed to be plotting against Abydos.
desc.thai: After a careful inspection on the records, they did find out the money was flowing into the bank, and was directly used to support the Helmet Gang. Everything showed that Kaiser Corporation seemed to be plotting against Abydos.
desc.ko: After a careful inspection on the records, they did find out the money was flowing into the bank, and was directly used to support the Helmet Gang. Everything showed that Kaiser Corporation seemed to be plotting against Abydos.
desc.zh_tw: 眾人經過對記錄的詳細檢查，發現記錄的確流向了黑市銀行，並發現自己的款項被直接用於頭盔團的支援工作。一切表明凱撒公司似乎對阿拜多斯圖謀不軌。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人经过对记录的详细检查，发现记录的确流向了黑市银行，并发现自己的款项被直接用于头盔团的支持工作。一切表明凯撒公司似乎对阿拜多斯图谋不轨。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人经过对记录的详细检查，发现记录的确流向了黑市银行，并发现自己的款项被直接用于头盔团的支持工作。一切表明凯撒公司似乎对阿拜多斯图谋不轨。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 众人经过对记录的详细检查，发现记录的确流向了黑市银行，并发现自己的款项被直接用于头盔团的支持工作。一切表明凯撒公司似乎对阿拜多斯图谋不轨。

desc.en: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.jp: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.thai: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.ko: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠用向對策委員會成員取得的錢攻擊阿拜多斯高中。對此，亞瑠感到良心的譴責而苦惱不斷。為了鼓勵無精打采的亞瑠，便利屋職員們一同前往柴關拉麵店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出現在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露用向对策委员会成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，阿露感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的阿露，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠用向对策委员会成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，亚瑠感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的亚瑠，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚瑠用向对策委员会成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，亚瑠感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的亚瑠，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。

desc.en: Aru was worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki didn't understand why Aru didn't take the money first, and Aru expressed her concern on being interfering too much by the customer.
desc.jp: Aru was worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki didn't understand why Aru didn't take the money first, and Aru expressed her concern on being interfering too much by the customer.

desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠一整晚對再戰阿拜多斯一行人而擔憂，遙香則佈置好了炸彈。無月不解為什麼亞瑠不先收錢辦事，亞瑠則說是怕被顧客干涉太多。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露一整晚对再战阿拜多斯一行人而担忧，遥香则布置好了炸弹。睦月不解为什么阿露不先收钱办事，阿露则说是怕被顾客干涉太多。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠一整晚对再战阿拜多斯一行人而担忧，遥香则布置好了炸弹。无月不解为什么亚瑠不先收钱办事，亚瑠则说是怕被顾客干涉太多。

desc.en: Someone purposed to get back to Gehenna, yet by Kayoko's careful analysis, the existence of the Prefect Team, especially Hina, would make them impossible to win and therefore impractical to go back.
desc.jp: Someone purposed to get back to Gehenna, yet by Kayoko's careful analysis, the existence of the Prefect Team, especially Hina, would make them impossible to win and therefore impractical to go back.

desc.zh_tw: 中間有人提出了回到格黑娜的選項，但佳代子謹慎分析了形勢，認為由於有風紀委員會，尤其是陽奈的存在，他們幾乎沒有勝算，回去其實挺不實際的。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 中间有人提出了回到格黑娜的选项，但佳代子谨慎分析了形势，认为由于有风纪委员会，尤其是日奈的存在，他们几乎没有胜算，回去其实挺不实际的。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 中间有人提出了回到格黑娜的选项，但佳代子谨慎分析了形势，认为由于有风纪委员会，尤其是阳奈的存在，他们几乎没有胜算，回去其实挺不实际的。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 中间有人提出了回到格黑娜的选项，但佳代子谨慎分析了形势，认为由于有风纪委员会，尤其是阳奈的存在，他们几乎没有胜算，回去其实挺不实际的。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
